thread.title: convenient location
thread.title_full: convenient location - Review of Days Inn London Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: raa877
title: convenient location
text: Stayed at this hotel for the first time on business trip. The hotel is very basic from comfort point of view. Very small room. Budget hotel. But for our purposes it was good. The room, the sheets and towels were all clean, the breakfast was modest, but all we needed to start the day without searching for places to eat outside. And the location was perfect for us. Quick walk to Paddington station, easy access to Heathrow and London sites.
